comment: Dr. Brown is a great guy. His dry and witty sense of humor made coming to class everyday enjoyable. His tests can be challenging, but he tells you this. If you come to class and read the book as well as take notes, you will pass the tests fine. The semester plan is laid out in the beginning and he follows accordingly. Highly recommend.

Dr. Brown is flat out awesome. I enjoyed coming to his class everyday. He engages the students and makes lectures extremely enjoyable and interactive. He is passionate about what he does and make learning fun. Come to class, study hard, and you'll be fine. You do have to work hard for your grade, but he's there to help you succeed in any way.

Professor Brown lays out everything that has to be done at the beginning of the semester. He grades fairly and as long as you are putting in the effort you will make the grade. Extremely understanding and clear about what he expects. 10/10 high recommended
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: 2 Article Reviews, 1 Group Project, Midterm, and a Final. Great professor,  loves to joke around. He is an easy grader for the most part. When he says tests are 50% book and 50% notes - he means it! Used 2 books for this class. I'm not sure if you can get away with not buying the books. I recommend at least renting them. In class tests.

Great Professor, always kept me laughing in class. 6 Chapters, 3 Quizzes (2 Chapters Each) 10-12 page research paper with partner, Legal brief with partner. I always enjoyed browns classes. Had him for two classes this semester. Loves presentations at the end of the semesters. Our only test was a final. Made an A overall. Sport Law is great!

Best teacher I had in college. He is keeps it simple and teaches you everything you need to know for the work world after college. Very involved in the industry and very knowledgeable. Took him for 3 or 4 classes and loved them all. Also has a witty but sarcastic personality which makes it fun.

He is a good professor. Probably exactly what a professor should be in college. Clear notes, very helpful, and tough tests. You have to be committed to make an A, but you will get a B as long as you try in the class. Nice guy overall, and interesting professor to take. Will take again.

The epitome of what an online class should be like. You will need your book for case study assignments! He quickly responds to emails. Great class and interesting material. TIP: You can wait a bit before the 1st SBJ event is due and buy the 12 week subscription for a bit cheaper

Dr. Brown is AWESOME!! He has a very sarcastic personality which I found hilarious and entertaining. He shows interest in his students! Dont miss class and participate in discussions! Test are kind of hard. You have to study notes from ppt AND book! I made C's on test but with making A's on all other assignments I came out with a B in the class. :)

Prof. Brown is awesome! One of my favorite thus far at KSU! First day came off kind of strict, but as long as you do what your supposed to do and show respect you wont have any problems. Class is fairly easy except for the tests! You have to study but I still managed to get an A! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
